message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm holding out for something closer to $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $87.50?
I'm still a bit short on budget, Alice. I'm willing to pay $85, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you meet me at $85?
